Class BlockStateBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.proxies.ProxyBase<org.bukkit.block.BlockState>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.proxies.BlockStateProxy
        • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.bases.BlockStateBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proxy<org.bukkit.block.BlockState>, org.bukkit.block.BlockState, org.bukkit.metadata.Metadatable

    public class BlockStateBase
extends BlockStateProxy
    A base class for a Block State implementation. Does not extend CraftBlockState, this Class is meant as a copied replacement. (Why is there no base class in the Bukkit API? How annoying.)
